name: Lantern-Warden of the Wilds
description: An ancient wolf-spirit roams the borders of human lands at dusk, guiding beasts away from hunts with a spectral lantern that burns like moonfire. Those who meet the Warden may strike a {pact} for safe passage, but breaking such oaths carries dire consequences.
tags_and_statuses: {watchful-1} or {unyielding-2}, depending on the hunters' resolve
general_consequences: Cold moonlight bites at exposed skin ({numbed-1})
The forest itself watches (**Exposure** or scratch a tag of stealth)

limits.name: Bargain
limits.on_max: {pact with the warden} becomes a story theme for the night and the Hero can wander the woods freely.

limits.name: Track
limits.on_max: Hunters lose the trail and drift into the thickets ({disoriented-3}) and a **New Challenge**: The Mistbound Pack, manifests.

threats.name: Unravel the Hunt
threats.description: Scatter the hunters' lines and turn their hounds astray under drifting fog
consequences: Hounds falter and circle ({confused-2}); scratch a tag related to the hounds
Lantern-glare blinds a marksman ({blinded-2}) until they douse their torch
A lone hunter wanders to the brink of the ravine (**Ill Tidings** or {imperiled-3})

threats.name: Summon the Mistbound
threats.description: A chorus of spectral wolves pads through the haze, hemming intruders in
consequences: The way back vanishes behind bramble illusions: {lost-2}
A spectral wolf steps forthâ€”parley or be cornered (**New Challenge**: Spectral Wolf and {pressured-3})

special_features.name: Moon-Lantern's Call
special_features.description: When the lantern glows, beasts heed the Warden. PCs resisting its pull face {dazed-1} or **scratch a tag** representing their resolve.

special_features.name: Pact of Steadfast Paths
special_features.description: If the party honors the Warden's terms, gain {safe-passage-2} until daybreak. Breaking the pact inflicts {!oath-breaker}.

meta.source: Lantern in the Mist - Sample Challenges
